name: Limitless Top Gear Drift
description:
this game supports mobile accelometer and I recommend you try it on android or with a controler I forgot to add ui I used godot default icon and there is no sound effects since I made this game solo hope you enjoy there was a time slow mechanice but I removed it since there is no cars to race aganist 

Use chrome or firefox to avoid any issues

This game was made for the LTGD game jam
